AzureBlade:

Where in the Matrix am I?

The dragon looked around him. Thick fog covered the shore of the small 
island sitting northwest of a greater continent. The last memory he 
remembered before he had entered the stasis pod was being on Cybertron, and 
being forced to leave his homeworld... He didn't quite remember why 
though... But now, he knew where to go.

AzureBlade:
I do not know why or how, but I sense you. All of you. I must go south, far 
to the south to rejoin you. May the Matrix guide my journey...
